en.login_subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account.
en.register_subtitle: Enter your credentials to create an account.
en.ranking_no_login: Log in to your account to see your ranking.
en.logout_message: Do you want to logout of your account?
en.help_p1_1: In %{name}, your mission is to test and improve your knowledge of synonyms. You will be presented with one word and four possible synonym options. It's up to you to choose the right answer to score points and progress in the game.
en.help_p2_1: Choose a Level: Begin by choosing the difficulty level that corresponds to your mastery of synonyms: Easy, Medium or Hard.
en.help_p2_2: Discover the Word: You will be presented with a starting word.
en.help_p2_3: Select the Correct Synonym: Among the four options proposed, select the synonym that best corresponds to the word given.
en.help_p2_4: Score Points: Each correct answer you earn points. Try to accumulate as many points as possible to climb to the top score.
en.help_p3_1: Index: Get an index on the right answer.
en.help_p3_2: Eliminate: Remove two incorrect options, leaving you with a more restricted choice.
en.help_p4_1: Read attentively: Be sure to understand the word given and the options proposed.
en.help_p4_2: Think about Context: Sometimes the context can help you find the right synonym.
en.help_p4_3: Use Strategic Bonus: Choose wisely when using your bonus to maximize your advantage.
en.help_p4_4: Ready to take on the Synonyms Challenge? Launch yourself in %{name} and show your linguistic skills now!
en.leave_message: Are you sure you want to leave?
en.email_error: Please enter a valid email address
en.confirm_pass_error: The passwords must be the same
en.min_length_error: %{field} must be at least %{min} characters long
en.max_length_error: %{field} must be at most %{min} characters long
en.default_error_msg: An error occured, please try again
